Ulmar001.m4a.title: E001: Meet our Heroes
Ulmar001.m4a.description: We meet the players, they meet Henk, Wip, Oril, and a gang ready to kick their ass. The gang lacks the skill to kick their ass tho, and instead a few go running away. As the characters revel in their accomplishments they realize Oril is missing, only to find him knocked out in the alleyway.

Ulmar002.m4a.title: E002: Hot Pursuit
Ulmar002.m4a.description: The gang chases down a lone goon evading them. He's got a big lead and darts into a service entrance in the mall. Eldin hijacks a truck, O'Fearain commondeers a car, and the rest hoof it. When the thief is apprehended and interrogated he's met with a shocking demise.

Ulmar003.m4a.title: E003: Invisible Assailant
Ulmar003.m4a.description: A lightning ball thrown from the darkness kills the captive. Constables arrive on scene and are persuaded to arrest the mage Avozahar. The party heads over to the Dogwood Precinct to explain the chaos.

Ulmar004.m4a.title: E004: Police Ineptitude
Ulmar004.m4a.description: John VonDeMort assists the party in setting up their story, Inspector Elaias brings in a truth syrum contraption, and the party is broken out of the precinct by none other than Avozahar's henches

Ulmar005.m4a.title: E005: Suspicious Contacts
Ulmar005.m4a.description: The party attempts to learn more about what weeds they're in. They learn of the Humoric Elements and set out to collect one more (the Brown Mold Heart) from Hardfort Keep in the North

Ulmar006.m4a.title: E006: Road Trip
Ulmar006.m4a.description: The Players road trip up to Hardfort, but trade some money at a rest stop on the way.
